title: K&L Recycling Services Website
shortDescription: Professional recycling services website with WCAG AA accessibility, PWA features, and comprehensive service information
challenge: Creating an accessible, SEO-optimized website for a family-owned recycling business that showcases their services, builds trust with customers, and provides an excellent user experience across all devices while meeting WCAG AA accessibility standards.
solution: Developed a modern, responsive website with progressive web app capabilities, comprehensive accessibility features, structured data markup, and integrated service showcases with testimonials and contact forms.

metrics.label: Page Load Speed
metrics.description: Average page load time on mobile

screenshots.caption: Clean, professional homepage with service overview
